ComicInfo.Title: Chapter II: The Golden Army
ComicInfo.Summary:
“The Grand Old Army”
The epic journeys persist, courtesy of VITA AYALA (Shuri, Livewire, The Wilds) and OLYMPIA SWEETMAN!
Xena and Gabrielle find themselves amidst a deadly quarrel between The God Of Strife and The God Of Discord! The only way to save a village of innocents is for Xena to agree to lead an army against an incoming Roman legion. But Xena’s “army” is comprised of…the village elders!?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | David Mack | 1 | B | Cover B | Emanuela Lupacchino | 2 | C | Cover C | Paulina Ganucheau | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | David Mack | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Paulina Ganucheau | 6 |
